h3.a: Breakfast/Lunch Drop-Off and Instructional Assignment Pick-up Locations

div.p:
Starting Wednesday, March 25, 2020, Harrold ISD will provide daily (Mon-Fri) breakfast and lunch for students at the locations and times listed below.
Kindergarten through 4th grade instructional assignments (required school work) should be picked up at the same time and location as the meals.
5th-12th grade assignments will be issued through Google Classroom. Contact mindee.thweatt@harroldisd.net for more information.
